metadata.inclusion:
Steps for Performing Classic device inclusion:

Step 1: Have the device to be added ready and ensure it has been reset

Step 2: Go to MENU --> DEVICE SETUP --> ADD DEVICE

Step 3: Press the SCAN button

Step 4: Press the ACTION button on the device to be added

Step 5: Enter Partial DSK String if adding o S2 Secure mode and Submit

Step 6: For S0 and Unsecure devices press the ACTION button and add without DSK

Step 7: Choose the device from the list of Available Devices and Click ADD. The device is added and can be renamed
metadata.exclusion:
Step 1: Go to MENU --> DEVICE SETUP --> REMOVE DEVICE
Step 2: Click CONFIRM on the pop-up message
Step 3: Make sure you have the device with you and press the REMOVE button and then immediately press the action button on your device
Step 4: The device will be removed from the z-wave network and from Vesta. This may take up to 60 seconds. Once the device is removed it will no longer be visible in the Device List
metadata.reset:
Factory Reset: 

Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable.

Factory reset can be performed in 2 ways:

1] Hardware Factory Reset: To reset the hub back to its factory default state, press the reset button (next to the power cycle button) continuously for up to 5 seconds. You will hear a voice prompt to say the factory reset process has started. Then please allow up to 5 minutes for the whole reset process to complete. Once the hub has been reset, you will be notified by another voice prompt at the end to indicate that the reset process has been complete.

2] Factory Reset through APP UI:
Step 1: Go to MENU --> SETTINGS --> FACTORY RESET
Step 2: Press PROCEED in the reset confirmation dialog box
Step 3: Wait for 4 minutes for the reset process to be complete
